about_the_game:
"Nexus Flow of Time" turn-based system:




  • Tactical Phase : time is stopped, Plan your actions with precision
  • Unleash Phase:  Watch your and the ennemies actions unfold simultaneously

"Say goodbye to waiting your turn! Experience the thrill of simultaneous strategy."

Foresight system:




  • the Nexus grants you a unique ability by revealing the actions your enemies intend to take
  • plan and counter your opponent’s strategy, emphasizing skill over luck

"No more unpredictable AI. Outsmart your opponent with strategic foresight!"

Fast Character Progression:

  • you’ll discover powerful artefacts created by the Nexus
  • characters evolve quickly, unlocked powerful abilities

"Why wait to level up? Rapid progression lets you build your dream team faster!"

Dungeon Crawler Experience:

  • use Arcane Portals between worlds in a bid to dominate them all
  • exploring vast, interconnected dungeons

"Explore vast dungeons, not just tiny maps. Dive deep into a world of endless adventure!"

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22 or SteamOS Holo
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700 2.6 GHz or AMD Phenom 9950 Quad Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB ATI Radeon HD 5770, 1GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 14.5.0 64 bit
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB ATI Radeon HD 5770, 1GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The 'Nexus' stops time, giving you the power to predict every enemy move in advance. Outsmart their attacks and optimize your actions. Each turn becomes a tactical puzzle where planning and anticipation are key, rather than reaction.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Dutch, Korean, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
